main event: A reddish-white object, first the size of a baseball then diminishing to the size of a baseball, moved in a zigzag fashion at a very slow speed over Wheelus AFB in Tripoli, Libya on September 1, 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared motionless at times.
There was a significant temperature inversion from the surface to 1,000 feet at the time of the sighting.
No interceptor action was taken and no known air traffic was in the area.
The observer was a civilian technical representative from the Philco Corporation who was considered sober and intelligent with training in electronics.
A similar sighting by another observer about 5 miles away was also reported.
